posts.title: Building My Journal Pipeline
posts.subtitle: How I automated my daily journal sync from Google Docs to GitHub Pages
posts.excerpt: I wanted a way to write my daily journal entries naturally in Google Docs, then automatically sync them to my portfolio site. Here's how I built a local pipeline using Python, Ollama, and GitHub Pages.
posts.content:
This is an example blog post. You can add your own content here.

To add a new blog post, edit the blog.json file in the journal/src/data/ directory.
